summary: A younger brother with Aspergers syndrome helps his older brother find a girlfriend.
cast: Bill Skarsgård|Martin Wallström|Cecilia Forss|Sofie Hamilton|Kristoffer Berglund|Jimmi Edlund|Susanne Thorson|Mats Qviström|Per Andersson|Lotta Tejle|Ingmar Virta|Linda Skogh|Petra Nylander|Sanne Mikaelsdotter|Siri Hjorton Wagner|Anna Westin|Andreas Nilsson|Anders Öhrström|Robert Sandström|Katarina Norström|Per Öhman|Björn-Erik Sundström|Jarmo Eklund|Petter Olofsson|Margareta Carlsson|Jonathan Sjöberg|Andreas Öhman|Molly|Nixon|Bibbi|Bonita
keywords: asperger's syndrome|eastern europe|autism|brother brother relationship|dumped by girlfriend
title: I rymden finns inga känslor
